archetypes.prompt_template: What is {a} + {b}? Give only the number as answer.
If {animal1} has {num1} legs and {animal2} has {num2} legs, how many legs total? Give only the number.
archetypes.param_gen: const animals = ['cat','dog','bird']; const animal1 = animals[Math.floor(Math.random()*3)]; const animal2 = animals[Math.floor(Math.random()*3)]; const num1 = animal1==='bird'?2:4; const num2 = animal2==='bird'?2:4; return {animal1, animal2, num1, num2};
